vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in TokenBank.withdrawToHolder (patch_10.sol#68-76):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(_to.call.value(_amount)()) (patch_10.sol#74)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- holders (patch_10.sol#75)

vulnerability_findings.message: Ownable.changeOwner (patch_10.sol#11-14) should be declared external

vulnerability_findings.message: Ownable.confirmOwner (patch_10.sol#16-20) should be declared external

vulnerability_findings.message: TokenBank.fallback (patch_10.sol#48-50) should be declared external

vulnerability_findings.name: external-function
vulnerability_findings.message: TokenBank.withdrawTokenToHolder (patch_10.sol#57-66) should be declared external

vulnerability_findings.name: external-function
vulnerability_findings.message: TokenBank.withdrawToHolder (patch_10.sol#68-76) should be declared external

vulnerability_findings.name: solc-version
vulnerability_findings.message:
Detected issues with version pragma in patch_10.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (patch_10.sol#1): it allows old versions

vulnerability_findings.name: low-level-calls
vulnerability_findings.message:
Low level call in Token.withdrawToken (patch_10.sol#29-36):
	-require(bool)(_token.call(bytes4(keccak256()(transfer(address,uint256))),_to,_amount)) patch_10.sol#35

vulnerability_findings.name: low-level-calls
vulnerability_findings.message:
Low level call in TokenBank.withdrawToHolder (patch_10.sol#68-76):
	-require(bool)(_to.call.value(_amount)()) patch_10.sol#74
